narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Alameda Health System is a Assisted Living Facility provider based in San Leandro, CA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $30.6M in Medicaid payments across 2K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $30.6M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
